headline: THERMOTRON BURN-IN TEST SYSTEM 177°C
description: Burn-In Test System       Burn-In Test System   can be modified by Thermotron for your requirements. Additional features can be added.
specstable:
Manufacturer Thermotron
Model S-1.2-H-PTS-TX
Maximum Temperature 177 ºC (351 ºF, 450 ºK)
Minimum Temperature 21 ºC (70 ºF, 294.00 ºK)
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Interface IEEE 488-GPIB
Controller Manufacturer/Model Thermotron 2800
Number of Control Zones 1
Capacity/Volume Box 1.20 cu ft (0.03 cu m)
Chamber Size
Width 16.00 in (40.64 cm)
Depth 11.00 in (27.94 cm)
Height 12.00 in (30.48 cm)
Chamber Characteristics
Chamber Construction Stainless steel
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Other Information

System configuration

  • Temperature Chamber
  • Functional test system
    Test system model PTS-TX-BI
    Host computer: HP Pentium
  • IEEE-488 Parallel interface board
  • PTSWin Software package
  • Excel software
  • PC Anywhere software
  • 14" LCD Monitor
  • Key board PTS Unit: 6 analog Input
    Power supplies:
  • Hewlett Packard HP6209B: 0-320V/0-0.1A
  • International Power model HDD-15-5
    Saftey devices:
  • Three position limit switch on console door
  • Emergency power off button
  • Saftey interface with Temperature Chamber
    Chamber Interior:
    Rack for 6 test boards
    Each board has two 28 position edge connectors
    Thermotron Transmitter Board P/N 4811568B (behind chamber)
    Thermotron P/N: 481131B Test fixture with 4.5" Edge connector with 28 contact pads. (inside chamber)
    Board dimension 11 5/8"W x 6 7/8"L
Power Requirements 115 V 7.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1998
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 32.500 in (82.6 cm)
Depth 37.500 in (95.3 cm)
Height 78.000 in (198.1 cm)
Weight 886 lb (402 kg)
